name: Embers (Anuke)
description:
Note that the game doesn't have a loading screen, and may appear black for some time.

If you are unable to use WASD controls, try refreshing the page or switching applications.

Some important recipes:

  • Rock + stick = axe
  • Axe + rock = pickaxe
  • Rock + fire = glowing rock
  • Glowing rock + stick = torch
